Description: The mean of the signal inside the current epoch.
The minimum of the signal inside the current epoch.
The time where the minimum of the signal (inside the epoch) was reached, relative to the start of the epoch.
The maximum of the signal inside the current epoch.
The time where the maximum of the signal (inside the epoch) was reached, relative to the start of the epoch.
The standard deviation (nanstd) of the signal inside the current epoch.
The count of the valid samples inside the current epoch.
